summary: This bill, the Veterans Flight Training Responsibility Act of 2025, amends Title 38 of the United States Code to limit the amount of educational assistance payable for flight training under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program for veterans. It sets a maximum of $100,000 for flight training fees at public institutions, with annual increases based on the Consumer Price Index. The amendments apply to individuals starting flight training on or after August 1, 2026.
